name: mangata-e2e-tests
description: sets asset info for assets bridged from ethereum to mangata
author: Gleb Urvanov

scripts.postinstall: husky install ;  yarn config set enableTelemetry 0 ;
scripts.test-sequential: export JEST_HTML_REPORTERS_PUBLIC_PATH=reports/html-report-seq; rm nonce.db ; rm sudo.lock; jest --verbose --runInBand --group=sequential --forceExit
scripts.test-seqgasless: export GASLESS=true; export JEST_HTML_REPORTERS_PUBLIC_PATH=reports/html-report-seq; rm nonce.db ; rm sudo.lock; jest --verbose --runInBand --group=seqgasless --forceExit
scripts.test-paralgasless: export GASLESS=true; export JEST_HTML_REPORTERS_PUBLIC_PATH=reports/html-report-parallel; rm nonce.db; rm sudo.lock; jest --verbose --ci --group=paralgasless --forceExit
scripts.test-sequential-no-bootstrap: export JEST_HTML_REPORTERS_PUBLIC_PATH=reports/html-report-seq; rm nonce.db ; rm sudo.lock; jest --verbose --runInBand --group=sequential --group=-bootstrap --group=-rewards-bootstrap --forceExit
scripts.test-sequential-autocompound: export JEST_HTML_REPORTERS_PUBLIC_PATH=reports/html-report-seq; rm nonce.db ; rm sudo.lock; jest --verbose --runInBand --group=rewardsV2 --forceExit
scripts.test-sequential-e2e: export JEST_HTML_REPORTERS_PUBLIC_PATH=reports/html-report-seq-e2e; rm nonce.db; rm sudo.lock; jest --verbose --runInBand --ci --group=critical  --forceExit
scripts.test-sequential-files: export JEST_HTML_REPORTERS_PUBLIC_PATH=reports/html-report-seq-e2e; rm nonce.db ; rm sudo.lock; jest --verbose --runInBand --ci  --forceExit
scripts.test-bootstrap: export JEST_HTML_REPORTERS_PUBLIC_PATH=reports/html-report-seq; rm nonce.db ; rm sudo.lock; jest --verbose --runInBand --group=bootstrap --group=-bootstrap-rewards --forceExit
scripts.test-rewards-bootstrap: export JEST_HTML_REPORTERS_PUBLIC_PATH=reports/html-report-seq; rm nonce.db ; rm sudo.lock; jest --verbose --runInBand --group=rewards-bootstrap --forceExit
scripts.test-maintenance: export JEST_HTML_REPORTERS_PUBLIC_PATH=reports/html-report-seq-e2e; rm nonce.db; rm sudo.lock; jest --verbose --runInBand --group=maintenance
scripts.test-github: export JEST_HTML_REPORTERS_PUBLIC_PATH=reports/html-report;  rm nonce.db ; rm sudo.lock; jest --verbose  --ci --forceExit
scripts.test-multiswap: export GASLESS=true; export JEST_HTML_REPORTERS_PUBLIC_PATH=reports/html-report-parallel;rm nonce.db ; rm sudo.lock; jest --verbose --ci --group=multiswap --forceExit
scripts.test-xcm: export CHOPSTICK_ENABLED=true ; export MANGATA_ENDPOINT=wss://mangata-x.api.onfinality.io/public-ws ; export JEST_HTML_REPORTERS_PUBLIC_PATH=reports/html-report-parallel;rm nonce.db ; rm sudo.lock; jest --verbose --ci --group=xcm --forceExit
